author: James Howard Kunstler
title: Where Will You Live in the Post Covid-19 Future?
description:
Cities are cramped, sprawling suburbs are a dead end. That leaves two places betterequipped for uncertain times.

content: Cities are cramped, sprawling suburbs are a dead end. That leaves two places well equipped for uncertain times. The Covid-19 corona virus has suddenly accelerated two momentous historical trends long lurking in the background of everyday life, but generally t… [+6257 chars]
